align.description: The align of the preview card element to the anchor element along its cross axis.

alignOffset.description: The offset of the preview card element along its align axis.

anchor.description: The anchor element to which the preview card popup will be placed at.

arrowPadding.description: Determines the padding between the arrow and the preview card popup's edges. Useful when the preview card popup has rounded corners via border-radius.

className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

collisionBoundary.description: The boundary that the preview card element should be constrained to.

collisionPadding.description: The padding of the collision boundary.

container.description: The container element to which the preview card popup will be appended to.

keepMounted.description: If true, preview card stays mounted in the DOM when closed.

positionMethod.description: The CSS position strategy for positioning the preview card popup element.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.

side.description: The side of the anchor element that the preview card element should align to.

sideOffset.description: The gap between the anchor element and the preview card element.

sticky.description: If true, allow the preview card to remain in stuck view while the anchor element is scrolled out of view.

cssVariablesDescriptions.--available-height: The available height between the trigger and the edge of the viewport.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--available-width: The available width between the trigger and the edge of the viewport.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--transform-origin: The coordinates that this element is anchored to. Used for animations and transitions.
